contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} [[File:Kamikoani in Akita Prefecture Ja.svg|thumb|Location of Kitaakita District in [[Akita Prefecture|Akita]]]] {{nihongo|'''Kitaakita'''|北秋田郡|Kitaakita-gun}} is a [[districts of Japan|district]] located in [[Akita Prefecture|Akita]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the district has an estimated [[population]] of 3,145 and a [[population density|density]] of 12.25 persons per km². The total area is 256.82 km². ==Towns and villages== *[[Kamikoani, Akita|Kamikoani]] ==Mergers== *On March 22, 2005, the towns of [[Aikawa, Akita|Aikawa]], [[Ani, Akita|Ani]], [[Moriyoshi, Akita|Moriyoshi]], and [[Takanosu, Akita|Takanosu]] merged to form the city of [[Kitaakita, Akita|Kitaakita]]. *On June 20, 2005, the towns of [[Hinai, Akita|Hinai]] and [[Tashiro, Akita|Tashiro]] merged into the city of [[Ōdate, Akita|Ōdate]]. {{Akita}} {{coord|39.960|N|140.321|E|type:landmark_source:itwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Districts in Akita Prefecture]] {{Akita-geo-stub}}
